name.fr: {0, plural, one[Chevalier sans tête] other[Chevaliers sans tête]}
name.es: {0, plural, one[Caballero sin Cabeza] other[Caballeros sin Cabeza]}
name.pt: {0, plural, one[Cavaleiro sem cabeça] other[Cavaleiros sem cabeça]}

description.fr:
{%attack} {LinkEffect:2[étreint]} la cible. 
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Gagne {PropertyEffect:8} s'il {LinkEffect:2[étreint]} un autre personnage.
description.en:
{%attack} {LinkEffect:2[Clutches]} the target.
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Gains {PropertyEffect:8} if he {LinkEffect:2[clutches]} another character.
description.es:
{%attack} {LinkEffect:2[estruja]} al objetivo. 
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Gana {PropertyEffect:8} si {LinkEffect:2[estruja]} a otro personaje.
description.de:
{%attack} {LinkEffect:2[umklammert]} das Ziel. 
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Erhält {PropertyEffect:8}, wenn er einen anderen Charakter {LinkEffect:2[umklammert]}.
description.pt:
{%attack} {LinkEffect:2[aperta]} o alvo. 
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Recebe {PropertyEffect:8} se ele {LinkEffect:2[aperta]} outro personagem.
